alert.note: Alert for Tulsa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 8:17AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Rogers, west central Mayes, western Wagoner and southeastern Tulsa Counties through 845 AM CDT... At 817 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Taiwah to 5 miles south of Broken Arrow. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Tulsa... Broken Arrow... Claremore... Owasso... Bixby... Jenks... Glenpool... Coweta... Catoosa... Verdigris... Inola... Stonebluff... Taiwah... Tiawah... Oneta... Liberty... Redbird... Leonard... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 225 and 249. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
